pr_title: Add new payment method: Australian PayID

timeline.bodyText:
Our naming convention would be: setPayId  and payId
Would require also changes in the protobuf
timeline.author: chimp1984

replies.bodyText: I think payid is one word in this case. It's not an id as part of bisq, just the name of the payment method.
replies.author: sqrrm

replies.bodyText: True. They use PayID... anyway not sure whats best here, but also not really important...
replies.author: chimp1984

replies.bodyText: I had it like that before, but I agree with @sqrrm that it is actually a brand name and should be without camelcase in that case.
replies.author: ripcurlx
